TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Recon Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units are good scouts and explorers, as they get better than usual results from Space Wreckage.
TEXT.French: Congratulations, you have trained your first Recon Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units are good scouts and explorers, as they get better than usual results from Space Wreckage.
TEXT.German: Congratulations, you have trained your first Recon Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units are good scouts and explorers, as they get better than usual results from Space Wreckage.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations, you have trained your first Recon Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units are good scouts and explorers, as they get better than usual results from Space Wreckage.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations, you have trained your first Recon Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units are good scouts and explorers, as they get better than usual results from Space Wreckage.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Light Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Light Ships are faster than the massive capital ships, but aren't as powerful. They are also cheaper.
TEXT.French: Congratulations, you have trained your first Light Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Light Ships are faster than the massive capital ships, but aren't as powerful. They are also cheaper.
TEXT.German: Congratulations, you have trained your first Light Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Light Ships are faster than the massive capital ships, but aren't as powerful. They are also cheaper.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations, you have trained your first Light Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Light Ships are faster than the massive capital ships, but aren't as powerful. They are also cheaper.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations, you have trained your first Light Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Light Ships are faster than the massive capital ships, but aren't as powerful. They are also cheaper.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Capital Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These are the most powerful combat unit in the game. While they are slow, they are very strong and easily capable of defeating light ships, carriers, and everything else.
TEXT.French: Congratulations, you have trained your first Capital Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These are the most powerful combat unit in the game. While they are slow, they are very strong and easily capable of defeating light ships, carriers, and everything else.
TEXT.German: Congratulations, you have trained your first Capital Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These are the most powerful combat unit in the game. While they are slow, they are very strong and easily capable of defeating light ships, carriers, and everything else.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations, you have trained your first Capital Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These are the most powerful combat unit in the game. While they are slow, they are very strong and easily capable of defeating light ships, carriers, and everything else.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations, you have trained your first Capital Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These are the most powerful combat unit in the game. While they are slow, they are very strong and easily capable of defeating light ships, carriers, and everything else.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Carrier Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units are designed to transport Squadron units around the map. Otherwise, they are weak in actual combat.
TEXT.French: Congratulations, you have trained your first Carrier Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units are designed to transport Squadron units around the map. Otherwise, they are weak in actual combat.
TEXT.German: Congratulations, you have trained your first Carrier Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units are designed to transport Squadron units around the map. Otherwise, they are weak in actual combat.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations, you have trained your first Carrier Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units are designed to transport Squadron units around the map. Otherwise, they are weak in actual combat.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations, you have trained your first Carrier Ship ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units are designed to transport Squadron units around the map. Otherwise, they are weak in actual combat.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Squadron ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Squadrons are capable of launching ranged attacks against distant plots, and are designed to be loaded into Carrier Ships.
TEXT.French: Congratulations, you have trained your first Squadron ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Squadrons are capable of launching ranged attacks against distant plots, and are designed to be loaded into Carrier Ships.
TEXT.German: Congratulations, you have trained your first Squadron ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Squadrons are capable of launching ranged attacks against distant plots, and are designed to be loaded into Carrier Ships.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations, you have trained your first Squadron ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Squadrons are capable of launching ranged attacks against distant plots, and are designed to be loaded into Carrier Ships.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations, you have trained your first Squadron ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Squadrons are capable of launching ranged attacks against distant plots, and are designed to be loaded into Carrier Ships.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Missile ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Missiles can be fired at targets like other units, cities, and improvements, but are destroyed when launched.
TEXT.French: Congratulations, you have trained your first Missile ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Missiles can be fired at targets like other units, cities, and improvements, but are destroyed when launched.
TEXT.German: Congratulations, you have trained your first Missile ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Missiles can be fired at targets like other units, cities, and improvements, but are destroyed when launched.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations, you have trained your first Missile ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Missiles can be fired at targets like other units, cities, and improvements, but are destroyed when launched.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations, you have trained your first Missile ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Missiles can be fired at targets like other units, cities, and improvements, but are destroyed when launched.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Star systems with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] can build Cruisers and Invasion Ships 20%% quicker.
TEXT.French: Félicitations ! Vous venez de trouver du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]fer[COLOR_REVERT], une ressource stratégique essentielle ! Star systems with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] can build Cruisers and Invasion Ships 20%% quicker.
TEXT.German: Herzlichen Glückwunsch! Ihr verfügt nun über die wichtige strategische Ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Eisen[COLOR_REVERT]! Star systems with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] can build Cruisers and Invasion Ships 20%% quicker.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni, hai ottenuto l'accesso alla risorsa [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ferro[COLOR_REVERT], un'importante risorsa strategica! Star systems with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] can build Cruisers and Invasion Ships 20%% quicker.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Habéis conseguido acceder al [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hierro[COLOR_REVERT], un importante recurso estratégico. Star systems with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] can build Cruisers and Invasion Ships 20%% quicker.

TEXT.English: Units won't pass through wormholes until the start of the next turn
TEXT.French: Units won't pass through wormholes until the start of the next turn
TEXT.German: Units won't pass through wormholes until the start of the next turn
TEXT.Italian: Units won't pass through wormholes until the start of the next turn
TEXT.Spanish: Units won't pass through wormholes until the start of the next turn

TEXT.English: No Inhabited Planets (goodies on solar systems) will be created
TEXT.French: No Inhabited Planets (goodies on solar systems) will be created
TEXT.German: No Inhabited Planets (goodies on solar systems) will be created
TEXT.Italian: No Inhabited Planets (goodies on solar systems) will be created
TEXT.Spanish: No Inhabited Planets (goodies on solar systems) will be created

TEXT.English: Starbases will not continuously produce missiles throughout the game
TEXT.French: Starbases will not continuously produce missiles throughout the game
TEXT.German: Starbases will not continuously produce missiles throughout the game
TEXT.Italian: Starbases will not continuously produce missiles throughout the game
TEXT.Spanish: Starbases will not continuously produce missiles throughout the game

TEXT.English: Sensor Stations are built by civilizations to monitor regions of space for scientific or military purposes. With the right equipment they can even detect cloaked ships.
TEXT.French: Sensor Stations are built by civilizations to monitor regions of space for scientific or military purposes. With the right equipment they can even detect cloaked ships.
TEXT.German: Sensor Stations are built by civilizations to monitor regions of space for scientific or military purposes. With the right equipment they can even detect cloaked ships.
TEXT.Italian: Sensor Stations are built by civilizations to monitor regions of space for scientific or military purposes. With the right equipment they can even detect cloaked ships.
TEXT.Spanish: Sensor Stations are built by civilizations to monitor regions of space for scientific or military purposes. With the right equipment they can even detect cloaked ships.

TEXT.English: The unit remains inactive until it reaches full strength or an enemy unit enters its visibility range.
TEXT.French: L'unité reste inactive tant qu'une unité ennemie ne pénètre pas dans son champ de vision.
TEXT.German: Die Einheit bleibt inaktiv, bis eine feindliche Einheit in Sichtweite ist.
TEXT.Italian: L'unità rimane inattiva finché un'unità nemica non diventa visibile.
TEXT.Spanish: La unidad permanecerá inactiva hasta que recobre el total de su fuerza o una unidad enemiga se sitúe al alcance de la visibilidad.

TEXT.English: [H1]Final Frontier Plus[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Welcome to Final Frontier Plus![PARAGRAPH:2]This mod is designed to significantly improve Final Frontier in every possible way. This ranges from fixing bugs to improving speed to improving AI to adding new content. Final Frontier Plus runs nearly as fast as unmodded Beyond the Sword, and adds quite a bit of new content, from planetary resources and wormholes to unique units and buildings.[PARAGRAPH:2]This section of the pedia will contain concept articles specifically for Final Frontier Plus features. Concepts from Jon Shafer's original version of Final Frontier can be found in the "Final Frontier Concepts" section. It is very much a work in progress.[PARAGRAPH:2][TAB]Contributors to Final Frontier Plus:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]Mod Team:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]TC01[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]God-Emperor[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Contributors (people who have helped out, given suggestions, or the creators of mods merged in):[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]deanej[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]cephalo[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]T-hawk[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]stmartin and HoTK team[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Sephi[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Valkrionn[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]phungus420[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kiwikaz[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The_J[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Emperor Fool[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]ColdFever[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]davidlallen[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Afforess[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pep[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]PieceOfMind[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]apenpaap[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]JEELEN[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]renegadechicken[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Other:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][TAB]Jon Shafer: The creator of Final Frontier[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2K Games/Firaxis Games: Producers of Civilization 4

TEXT.English: [H1]Planetary Resources[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Planets can now provide resources. Each solar system can only have one world with a resource on it, and a planet can only have one resource. These resources are: [LINK=BONUS_WHEAT]Grain[\LINK], [LINK=BONUS_COW]Cattle[\LINK], [LINK=BONUS_FISH]Seafood[\LINK], [LINK=BONUS_SPICES]Spices[\LINK], [LINK=BONUS_WINE]Wine[\LINK], and [LINK=BONUS_COTTON]Cotton[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:2]Each resource will provide benefits to the solar system (including health, happiness, food, and commerce, depending on the resource). A planet with one of these resources will be able to construct a special building that also provides benefits to the solar system (from an extra trade route to increasing the planet's population limit).
TEXT.French: [H1]Planetary Resources[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Planets can now provide resources. Each solar system can only have one world with a resource on it, and a planet can only have one resource. These resources are: [LINK=BONUS_WHEAT]Grain[\LINK], [LINK=BONUS_COW]Cattle[\LINK], [LINK=BONUS_FISH]Seafood[\LINK], [LINK=BONUS_SPICES]Spices[\LINK], [LINK=BONUS_WINE]Wine[\LINK], and [LINK=BONUS_COTTON]Cotton[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:2]Each resource will provide benefits to the solar system (including health, happiness, food, and commerce, depending on the resource). A planet with one of these resources will be able to construct a special building that also provides benefits to the solar system (from an extra trade route to increasing the planet's population limit).

TEXT.English: [H1]Inhabited Planets[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Some solar systems, you will find, are inhabited by alien species. These aliens are primitive and don't yet have interstellar civilizations of their own.[PARAGRAPH:2]These solar systems act as space wreckage- you will get a random result depending on how your ship's contact with the aliens goes. You might end up with a new technology, a map of the region around the star system, or a new solar system (if the aliens choose to join your empire). However, if the contact goes awry, the aliens might attempt to shoot down your ship with their own primitive vessels.
TEXT.French: [H1]Inhabited Planets[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Some solar systems, you will find, are inhabited by alien species. These aliens are primitive and don't yet have interstellar civilizations of their own.[PARAGRAPH:2]These solar systems act as space wreckage- you will get a random result depending on how your ship's contact with the aliens goes. However, if the contact goes awry, the aliens might attempt to shoot down your ship with their own primitive vessels.

TEXT.English: Use buggy code to spawn insane numbers of Pirate hordes
TEXT.French: Use buggy code to spawn insane numbers of Pirate hordes
TEXT.German: Use buggy code to spawn insane numbers of Pirate hordes
TEXT.Italian: Use buggy code to spawn insane numbers of Pirate hordes
TEXT.Spanish: Use buggy code to spawn insane numbers of Pirate hordes

TEXT.English: Disables the experience cap for killing Pirate units
TEXT.French: Disables the experience cap for killing Pirate units
TEXT.German: Disables the experience cap for killing Pirate units
TEXT.Italian: Disables the experience cap for killing Pirate units
TEXT.Spanish: Disables the experience cap killing Pirate units

TEXT.English: Use slower trade route calculations as opposed to randomized ones
TEXT.French: Use slower trade route calculations as opposed to randomized ones
TEXT.German: Use slower trade route calculations as opposed to randomized ones
TEXT.Italian: Use slower trade route calculations as opposed to randomized ones
TEXT.Spanish: Use slower trade route calculations as opposed to randomized ones

TEXT.English: Allows only Troop Transports (that is, Invasion Ships) to capture solar systems
TEXT.French: Allows only Troop Transports (that is, Invasion Ships) to capture solar systems
TEXT.German: Allows only Troop Transports (that is, Invasion Ships) to capture solar systems
TEXT.Italian: Allows only Troop Transports (that is, Invasion Ships) to capture solar systems
TEXT.Spanish: Allows only Troop Transports (that is, Invasion Ships) to capture solar systems

TEXT.English: Improves productivity of pirate solar systems
TEXT.French: Improves productivity of pirate solar systems
TEXT.German: Improves productivity of pirate solar systems
TEXT.Italian: Improves productivity of pirate solar systems
TEXT.Spanish: Improves productivity of pirate solar systems

TEXT.English: Reduces the number of pirates by half
TEXT.French: Reduces the number of pirates by half
TEXT.German: Reduces the number of pirates by half
TEXT.Italian: Reduces the number of pirates by half
TEXT.Spanish: Reduces the number of pirates by half

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Precision Instruments Maker[COLOR_REVERT] is an inexpensive building that gives a small increase in [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_COMMERCE]. Only one can be built in each star system.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Precision Instruments Maker[COLOR_REVERT] is an inexpensive building that gives a small increase in [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_COMMERCE]. Only one can be built in each star system.
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Precision Instruments Maker[COLOR_REVERT] is an inexpensive building that gives a small increase in [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_COMMERCE]. Only one can be built in each star system.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Precision Instruments Maker[COLOR_REVERT] is an inexpensive building that gives a small increase in [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_COMMERCE]. Only one can be built in each star system.
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Precision Instruments Maker[COLOR_REVERT] is an inexpensive building that gives a small increase in [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_COMMERCE]. Only one can be built in each star system.

TEXT.English: A precision instruments maker produces tools, scientific instruments, and other devices which require a high degree of precision. These can include measuring devices, from calibrated calipers to scales, and tools used to produce other things.
TEXT.French: A precision instruments maker produces tools, scientific instruments, and other devices which require a high degree of precision. These can include measuring devices, from calibrated calipers to scales, and tools used to produce other things.
TEXT.German: A precision instruments maker produces tools, scientific instruments, and other devices which require a high degree of precision. These can include measuring devices, from calibrated calipers to scales, and tools used to produce other things.
TEXT.Italian: A precision instruments maker produces tools, scientific instruments, and other devices which require a high degree of precision. These can include measuring devices, from calibrated calipers to scales, and tools used to produce other things.r
TEXT.Spanish: A precision instruments maker produces tools, scientific instruments, and other devices which require a high degree of precision. These can include measuring devices, from calibrated calipers to scales, and tools used to produce other things.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Advanced Shields[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hardened Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrades. It also allows the production of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Construction Ship 2[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Colony Ship 2[COLOR_REVERT] which can move through radiation clouds.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Advanced Shields[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hardened Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrades. It also allows the production of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Construction Ship 2[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Colony Ship 2[COLOR_REVERT] which can move through radiation clouds.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Advanced Shields[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hardened Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrades. It also allows the production of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Construction Ship 2[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Colony Ship 2[COLOR_REVERT] which can move through radiation clouds.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Advanced Shields[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hardened Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrades. It also allows the production of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Construction Ship 2[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Colony Ship 2[COLOR_REVERT] which can move through radiation clouds.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Advanced Shields[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hardened Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrades. It also allows the production of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Construction Ship 2[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Colony Ship 2[COLOR_REVERT] which can move through radiation clouds.

TEXT.English: Advancing technology allows significant improvements to ship shields in two ways. First, by simply doing more of what they already do, as seen in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Advanced Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrade. Second, by expanding function to cover additional things which leads to taking reduced damage from various forms of radiation, seen primarily in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hardened Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrade but also, to a lesser degree, in the Advanced Shields.
TEXT.French: Advancing technology allows significant improvements to ship shields in two ways. First, by simply doing more of what they already do, as seen in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Advanced Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrade. Second, by expanding function to cover additional things which leads to taking reduced damage from various forms of radiation, seen primarily in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hardened Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrade but also, to a lesser degree, in the Advanced Shields.

Second, by expanding function to cover additional things which leads to taking reduced damage from various forms of radiation, seen primarily in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hardened Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrade but also, to a lesser degree, in the Advanced Shields.

Second, by expanding function to cover additional things which leads to taking reduced damage from various forms of radiation, seen primarily in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hardened Shields[COLOR_REVERT] part upgrade but also, to a lesser degree, in the Advanced Shields.

TEXT.English: Unable to attack or defend, [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Colony Ships are the units which Colonize Star Systems after Advanced Shielding has been researched. Unlike the older Colony Ships, these can move across Radiation Clouds and even regions covered with Nebula.
TEXT.French: Unable to attack or defend, [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Colony Ships are the units which Colonize Star Systems after Advanced Shielding has been researched. Unlike the older Colony Ships, these can move across Radiation Clouds and even regions covered with Nebula.

TEXT.Spanish: Unable to attack or defend, [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Colony Ships are the units which Colonize Star Systems after Advanced Shielding has been researched. Unlike the older Colony Ships, these can move across Radiation Clouds and even regions covered with Nebula.

TEXT.English: The [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Construction Ship is used to build Warp and Jump Lanes to speed movement and the Extraction Facility to harvest resources. It is also necessary in order to create the powerful Starbase unit. Unlike the earlier Construction Ship, it can enter Radiation Clouds and areas of Nebula. It also works slightly faster.
TEXT.French: The [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Construction Ship is used to build Warp and Jump Lanes to speed movement and the Extraction Facility to harvest resources. It is also necessary in order to create the powerful Starbase unit. Unlike the earlier Construction Ship, it can enter Radiation Clouds and areas of Nebula. It also works slightly faster.

It is also necessary in order to create the powerful Starbase unit. Unlike the earlier Construction Ship, it can enter Radiation Clouds and areas of Nebula. It also works slightly faster.

English.TEXT: [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Rapid Construction Ship:[ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Rapid Construction Ships

French.Text: Vaisseau de construction rapide [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]:Vaisseaux de construction rapide [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

Italian.Text: Nave da costruzione rapida [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]:Navi da costruzione rapida [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

Spanish.Text: Nave de construcción rápida [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]:Naves de construcción r#225;pida [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

TEXT.English: The [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Rapid Construction Ship is not only extraordinarily fast when moving from place to place (big engines, little ship), but it also builds things even faster than a standard [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] construction ship.
TEXT.French: The [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Rapid Construction Ship is not only extraordinarily fast when moving from place to place (big engines, little ship), but it also builds things even faster than a standard [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] construction ship.

TEXT.Spanish: The [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Rapid Construction Ship is not only extraordinarily fast when moving from place to place (big engines, little ship), but it also builds things even faster than a standard [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] construction ship.

TEXT.English: The initial human colonization wave showed no signs of encountering any alien activity, or if it did, the PDE classified it so heavily that it was covered up and word never filtered down to the colonies themselves. But perhaps, somewhere, farther out in space, lurks the alien life predicted by human science fiction for the past few centuries?
TEXT.French: The initial human colonization wave showed no signs of encountering any alien activity, or if it did, the PDE classified it so heavily that it was covered up and word never filtered down to the colonies themselves. But perhaps, somewhere, farther out in space, lurks the alien life predicted by human science fiction for the past few centuries?

But perhaps, somewhere, farther out in space, lurks the alien life predicted by human science fiction for the past few centuries?
